about.description: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation of Earth system models in CMIP.
about.summary: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation of Earth system models in CMIP.

name: esmvaltool-python
raw_recipe:
# This file created by conda-build 3.22.0
# ------------------------------------------------

package:
  name: esmvaltool-python
  version: 2.7.0
source:
  sha256: 397f0e94d0f75112d159dad4e7fb6a16594e07749590fcef163eb99f10b10f1b
  url: https://pypi.io/packages/source/E/ESMValTool/ESMValTool-2.7.0.tar.gz
build:
  entry_points:
    - mip_convert_setup = esmvaltool.cmorizers.mip_convert.esmvt_mipconv_setup:main
    - nclcodestyle = esmvaltool.utils.nclcodestyle.nclcodestyle:_main
    - recipe_filler = esmvaltool.utils.recipe_filler:run
    - test_recipe = esmvaltool.utils.testing.recipe_settings.install_expand_run:main
  noarch: python
  number: 0
  string: pyhd8ed1ab_0
requirements:
  build:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - ca-certificates 2022.9.24 ha878542_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.39 hc81fddc_0
    - libffi 3.4.2 h7f98852_5
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h7f98852_0
    - libsqlite 3.39.4 h753d276_0
    - libuuid 2.32.1 h7f98852_1000
    - libzlib 1.2.13 h166bdaf_4
    - ncurses 6.3 h27087fc_1
    - openssl 3.0.5 h166bdaf_2

    - tzdata 2022e h191b570_0
    - wheel 0.37.1 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - xz 5.2.6 h166bdaf_0
  host:
    - _libgcc_mutex 0.1 conda_forge
    - _openmp_mutex 4.5 2_gnu
    - bzip2 1.0.8 h7f98852_4
    - ca-certificates 2022.9.24 ha878542_0
    - ld_impl_linux-64 2.39 hc81fddc_0
    - libffi 3.4.2 h7f98852_5
    - libgcc-ng 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libgomp 12.2.0 h65d4601_19
    - libnsl 2.0.0 h7f98852_0
    - libsqlite 3.39.4 h753d276_0
    - libuuid 2.32.1 h7f98852_1000
    - libzlib 1.2.13 h166bdaf_4

    - readline 8.1.2 h0f457ee_0
    - setuptools 65.5.0 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - setuptools-scm 7.0.5 pyhd8ed1ab_1
    - setuptools_scm 7.0.5 hd8ed1ab_1
    - tk 8.6.12 h27826a3_0
    - tomli 2.0.1 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - typing-extensions 4.4.0 hd8ed1ab_0
    - typing_extensions 4.4.0 pyha770c72_0
    - tzdata 2022e h191b570_0
    - wheel 0.37.1 pyhd8ed1ab_0
    - xz 5.2.6 h166bdaf_0
  run:
    - cartopy
    - cdo >=1.9.7
    - cdsapi
    - cf-units >=3.0.0,<3.1.0,!=3.0.1.post0

    - cmocean
    - cython
    - dask
    - ecmwf-api-client
    - eofs
    - esmpy
    - esmvalcore 2.7.*

    - fire
    - gdal
    - iris >=3.1.0
    - iris-esmf-regrid
    - jinja2
    - joblib
    - lime
    - mapgenerator >=1.0.5
    - matplotlib-base <3.6.0
    - natsort
    - nc-time-axis
    - netCDF4 !=1.6.1
    - numpy
    - openpyxl
    - pandas
    - progressbar2
    - prov
    - psy-maps
    - psy-reg
    - psy-simple
    - psyplot
    - pyproj >=2.1
    - python >=3.8
    - python-cdo
    - python-dateutil
    - pyyaml
    - rasterio
    - requests
    - ruamel.yaml

    - scikit-learn
    - scipy
    - seaborn

    - shapely
    - xarray >=0.12.0
    - xesmf =0.3.0
    - xgboost >1.6.1
    - xlsxwriter
test:
  commands:
    - pytest -n 2 --ignore="run_test.py" --ignore="tests/unit/documentation/" -k "not
      ([diagnostic.R] or [diagnostic.jl] or [diagnostic.ncl] or test_r_lint)"
    - esmvaltool --help
    - esmvaltool data --help
    - nclcodestyle --help
    - esmvaltool colortables --help
    - test_recipe --help
  imports:
    - esmvaltool
  requires:
    - flake8 <4
    - pytest >=3.9,!=6.0.0rc1,!=6.0.0
    - pytest-cov
    - pytest-env
    - pytest-flake8 >=1.0.6
    - pytest-html !=2.1.0
    - pytest-metadata >=1.5.1
    - pytest-xdist
  source_files:
    - setup.cfg
    - tests
about:
  description: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation
    of Earth system models in CMIP.
  home: https://www.esmvaltool.org
  license: Apache-2.0
  license_file: LICENSE
  summary: A community diagnostic and performance metrics tool for routine evaluation
    of Earth system models in CMIP.
extra:
  copy_test_source_files: true
  final: true
  recipe-maintainers:
    - bouweandela
    - nielsdrost
    - schlunma
    - sloosvel
    - valeriupredoi
    - zklaus
